item.title: Markdown
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown formatting that can be used in Congo, also it shows how some basic HTML elements are decorated.

item.title: External Article - Why I switched to Fathom Analytics
item.description: The externalUrl front matter parameter can link to any URL. This article looks just like any other, but will link to a post that is outside the Hugo project.
